title: Techniques for Comprehensive Risk Identification and Documentation

questions.text: What is the primary goal of risk identification?
options: To recognize potential risks before they impact the organization
To avoid making risk management decisions
questions.correctAnswer: To recognize potential risks before they impact the organization

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a type of risk?
What is the role of leadership in risk identification?
options: Ignoring risks until they become serious
Encouraging a culture of risk awareness and proactive identification
Delegating risk identification to external consultants only
Avoiding risk discussions in strategic meetings
questions.correctAnswer: Encouraging a culture of risk awareness and proactive identification

questions.text: Why is documenting identified risks important?
options: It helps in tracking and analyzing risk trends
It is only useful for compliance purposes
questions.correctAnswer: It helps in tracking and analyzing risk trends

questions.text: What does a Probability and Impact Matrix measure?
options: The likelihood and severity of a risk
The duration of a risk event

questions.correctAnswer: The likelihood and severity of a risk
